abstract: Minneapolis police believe Brian and Karen Short and their three teenage children were killed in murder-suicide and died of gunshot wounds; still unclear who shot whom in their Greenwood suburb home.
lead_paragraph: Police say they cannot say positively who shot whom.

headline.main: Minnesota: Murder-Suicide Was Result of Shootings
headline.print_headline: Minnesota: Murder-Suicide Was Result of Shootings

snippet: Police say they cannot say positively who shot whom.
